doc.title: Shelter
doc.plot: An unassuming dilapidated log cabin possesses the ability to transform the unconscious of its inhabitants into tangible reality. The cabin hungers for souls to come to it and become part of its "population." To this end, it employs a group of gatherers, forces within the cabin which can appear in human form. Each gatherer-recognizable as a character from universal mythologies-represents a facet of the human psyche.
